changelog.miscSummary:
• Enabled dark theme by default 
• Added 2 our new wallpapers 
• Introduced A12 Styles Switches 
• Added Java IDE & Type (Alt) clocks 
• Introduced Adaptive Playback 
• Introduced dynamic VoLTE & VoWiFi icons 
• Changed Gallery2 to QP Gallery Mod 
• Added Volume Panel Styles support 
• Added notification counter 
• Added toggle to disable “Lock” icon on Lock Screen 
• Updater app will be launched on “Rom card” click in “About Device” 
• Added support to enable/disable app volume rows 
• Introduced Automated DC Dimming 
• Added screenshot quality setting 
• Added an option to enable Wake on plug 
• Added option to enable AOD on charging only 
• Added option to enable/disable screenshot sound 
• Added option to enable/disable lockscreen shortcuts 
• Added lockscreen background blur 
• Added Gaming Mode 
• Added Gaming Mode tile 
• Added support for MiSound & DiracSound FX 
• Added option to show 4G icon instead of LTE option 
• Added option to show Data disabled icon 
• Added option to enable/disable roaming icon 
• Added option to enable/disable QS on Lock Screen.
changelog.systemSummary:
• Redesigned “Calculator” app 
• Update “Dialer” app UI 
• Updated “Settings” app dashboard UI 
• Small Quick Settings redesign 
• Few Blur improvements 
• Updated VoLTE icon from OxygenOS 11.
